title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 243.6 - Energy Efficiency and Renewable Energy Technology Account
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 243.6 - Energy Efficiency and Renewable Energy Technology Account

State Regulations
(a) The department will allocate allowances
to a CSAPR NO
x

Ozone Season Group 2 EERET account from
the CSAPR NO
x

Ozone Season Group 2 trading budget for
each control period. NYSERDA is required to make all the allowances in the
EERET account available for sale on the open market no later than 30 days after
receipt of the allowances by the EERET account. (b) Should NYSERDA fail to, or be unable to, receive CSAPR NO
x

Ozone Season Group 2 allowances into
the EERET account for any control period, the affected allowances will be
forfeited to the department. (c) Should NYSERDA fail to, or be unable to, sell or distribute CSAPR
NO
x

Ozone Season Group 2 allowances that have been
allocated to the EERET account within 12 months of the date the CSAPR
NO
x

Ozone Season Group 2 allowances are allocated under
subdivision (a) of this section, all subject CSAPR NO
x

Ozone Season Group 2 allowances remaining in the account will be forfeited to
the department. (d) By July 1st, following the forfeiture of the allowances to the department, the department
reserves the authority to retire or allocate any unused allowances on the
condition that the number of CSAPR NO
x

Ozone Season

Group 2 allowances that will be transferred to the compliance account covering
an existing CSAPR NO
x

Ozone Season Group 2 unit will not
cause the unit's total allocation for the control period to exceed its
potential to emit. The allocation procedure set forth in section
243.3
of this part will be used to
allocate allowances forfeited to the department to CSAPR
NO
x

Ozone Season Group 2 units. (e) The provisions of subdivisions (a)
through (d) of this section will apply with respect to any allowances
transferred by the Administrator to the department for disposition in
accordance with 40 CFR
97.812(b) (10)(ii)
(see

Table 1, section
200.9
of this
title). Notes
